meanings.definition: Cold cuts or sliced meats typically used for making sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: I made a sandwich with turkey lunchmeat for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The deli offers a variety of lunchmeat options for sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The ham lunchmeat tried to escape from the sandwich!
meanings.sent4: The lunchmeat was a colorful mosaic of flavors in the sandwich.
meanings.sent5: The fresh lunchmeat made the sandwich irresistible.

meanings.definition: Meat that is specifically prepared and packaged for consumption during lunch.
meanings.sent1: My mom always packs delicious lunchmeat for my school lunch.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store sells different types of lunchmeat for quick lunches.
meanings.sent3: The lunchmeat in my lunchbox whispered, 'Eat me first!'
meanings.sent4: The lunchmeat was a little surprise waiting to be unwrapped at lunchtime.
meanings.sent5: The juicy lunchmeat made my lunch break the best part of the day.
